title: MSBuild VSIX should depend on NuGet VSIX that delivers core logic
body: See details in NuGet/Home#7390. Moving the manifest would need a coordinated change here and in NuGet.Client.

nodes.body: IIRC offline we decided that this was sufficiently core functionality that instead of moving the manifest we should make the MSBuild vsix depend on the NuGet VSIX that delivers the resolver.
